de.bioforscher.singa.simulation.modules.reactions.model

Class Reactions

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.bioforscher.singa.simulation.modules.reactions.model.Reactions
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Module, CumulativeUpdateBehavior, UpdateBehavior

    public class Reactions
extends java.lang.Object
implements Module, CumulativeUpdateBehavior
    The Reactions module defines the entirety of chemical conversions that take place in the Simulation. All Reactions are calculated according to their specified KineticLawss and new concentrations are set using the applyTo(AutomatonGraph) method.
